data.lyric:
[ti:Never Be the Same]
[ar:Camila Cabello]
[al:Never Be the Same]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Never Be the Same - Camila Cabello (卡米拉·卡贝洛)
[00:03.74]Lyrics by：Camila Cabello/Adam Feeney/Leo Rami Dawod/Jacob Ludwig Olofsson/Noonie Bao/Sasha Yatchenko
[00:07.48]Composed by：Adam Feeney/Camila Cabello/Leo Rami Dawod/Jacob Ludwig Olofsson/Noonie Bao/Sasha Yatchenko
[00:11.23]Produced by：Frank Dukes
[00:14.97]Something must've gone wrong in my brain
[00:17.61]
[00:18.52]Got your chemicals all in my veins
[00:22.17]Feeling all the highs feeling all the pain
[00:24.96]
[00:29.75]Let go on the wheel it's the bullet lane
[00:33.25]Now I'm seeing red not thinking straight
[00:36.16]
[00:36.95]Blurring all the lines you intoxicate me
[00:40.64]
[00:43.55]Just like nicotine h****n M******e
[00:48.53]Suddenly I'm a fiend and you're all I need
[00:51.67]
[00:52.23]All I need
[00:53.23]
[00:55.08]Yeah you're all I need
[00:56.98]
[00:58.38]It's you babe
[01:00.43]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[01:04.23]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[01:07.78]You're to blame
[01:08.58]
[01:09.88]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never be the same
[01:13.33]It's you babe
[01:15.15]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[01:18.85]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[01:22.61]You're to blame
[01:23.56]
[01:24.66]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never ever ever be the same
[01:28.56]
[01:30.80]I'll never be the same
[01:32.35]
[01:34.51]I'll never be the same
[01:36.09]
[01:38.19]I'll never be the same
[01:39.79]
[01:43.53]Sneaking in L.A. when the lights are low
[01:47.19]Off of one touch I could overdose
[01:50.40]He said stop playing it safe
[01:52.25]Girl I wanna see you lose control
[01:55.31]
[01:57.68]Just like nicotine h****n M******e
[02:01.81]
[02:02.32]Suddenly I'm a fiend and you're all I need
[02:05.55]
[02:06.10]All I need
[02:07.04]
[02:08.92]Yeah you're all I need
[02:10.76]
[02:12.19]It's you babe
[02:14.31]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[02:17.90]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[02:21.55]You're to blame
[02:22.52]
[02:23.76]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never be the same
[02:27.12]It's you babe
[02:29.14]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[02:32.59]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[02:36.32]You're to blame
[02:37.38]
[02:38.20]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never ever ever be the same
[02:42.42]
[02:44.68]I'll never be the same
[02:46.15]
[02:48.38]I'll never be the same
[02:49.93]
[02:52.03]I'll never be the same
[02:53.61]
[02:56.96]You're in my blood you're in my veins you're in my head
[03:02.00]
[03:04.58]You're in my blood you're in my veins you're in my head
[03:09.35]
[03:11.67]It's you babe
[03:13.29]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[03:17.00]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[03:20.61]You're to blame
[03:21.52]You're to blame
[03:22.57]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never be the same
[03:26.28]It's you babe

[03:31.78]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[03:35.43]You're to blame
[03:36.30]
[03:37.66]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never ever ever be the same
data.trans:
[ti:Never Be the Same]
[ar:Camila Cabello]
[al:Never Be the Same]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.74]//
[00:07.48]//
[00:11.22]//
[00:14.97]我的大脑一定有什么地方出错了
[00:17.61]
[00:18.52]荷尔蒙充斥了我的全身
[00:22.17]感觉到了所有的激情 所有的痛苦
[00:24.96]
[00:29.75]继续前进 就算是一路荆棘
[00:32.45]
[00:33.25]现在我已经看到了警示信号 大脑却无法清醒
[00:36.16]
[00:36.95]所有的界限都已模糊 你让我无比陶醉
[00:40.64]
[00:43.55]你就像是会上瘾的毒药
[00:48.53]突然间我成了毒瘾患者 你就是我需要的一切
[00:51.67]
[00:52.23]我需要的一切
[00:53.23]
[00:55.08]你是我需要的一切
[00:56.98]
[00:58.38]就是你 宝贝
[01:00.43]我沉醉于你的一举一动 宝贝
[01:04.23]我可以试着逃跑 但那只是无用功
[01:07.78]这都是因为你
[01:08.58]
[01:09.88]一击毙命 你会知道我不再是从前的我
[01:13.33]这是因为你 宝贝
[01:15.15]我沉醉于你的一举一动 宝贝
[01:18.85]我可以试着逃跑 但那只是无用功
[01:22.61]这都是因为你
[01:23.56]
[01:24.66]一击毙命 你会知道我不再是从前的我
[01:28.56]
[01:30.80]我已不再是我
[01:32.35]
[01:34.51]我已不同以往
[01:36.09]
[01:38.19]我已不再是我
[01:39.79]
[01:43.53]当灯光黯淡 我悄悄潜入洛杉矶
[01:47.19]仅一个简单的触碰 就让我无法自拔
[01:50.40]他说 别再那样小心翼翼了
[01:52.25]女孩 我想要看到你失控的样子
[01:55.31]
[01:57.68]你就像是会上瘾的毒药

[02:53.61]
[02:56.96]你在我的血液中涌动 在我的血管中奔腾 在我的脑海中徘徊
